title: Client bugged?
body:
After the new patch my client is so buggy that it freezes and crashes after champ select. Lo and behold after restarting the comp and reconnecting I am greeted with leaver buster. Does any one else have this issue. RITO help plsss.
Am really sick and tired of having to wait the penalties due to a buggy patch. Infact it got so bad the game itself repatched on its own.

replies.body: This has happened to me atleast 3 times so far.....

It is fine till we go to the part where we select the skins.
Then after that instead of shifting to the loading screen the league of legends logo appears and just stays there goes unresponsive for 3 mins then crashes.
Then it takes about 10 mins for the client to restart and it goes to the login screen. and when i login am greeted with leaver buster.
Does this help mate?
Do you receive a specific error message when this occurs? Can you describe the exact symptoms you experience so I'll have a better idea of what's going on? ^.^
